name: cron
notes: Node.js cron job scheduler for running scheduled tasks (e.g., CronJob('0 0 * * *', callback)). Requires child_process for spawning tasks. Workers has built-in Scheduled Events (Cron Triggers) for scheduled tasks - use scheduled handler: export default { scheduled(event, env, ctx) { ... } }
alternative: Cloudflare Workers Scheduled Events (Cron Triggers) - built-in
